roleset.name: near or surrounding the bile duct

role.descr: thing that is near or surrounding

example.name: pericholedochal-j
example.text: Two pericholedochal lymph nodes are negative for adenocarcinoma .
example.amr: (n3 / negative-01 :ARG1 (a2 / anatomical-site :quant 2 :name (n2 / name :op1 "lymph" :op2 "node") :ARG0-of (p / pericholedochal-01)) :ARG2 (d / disease-disorder :name (n / name :op1 "adenocarcinoma")))

roleset.note: NOTES: Added for THYME-AMR. Based on pre-existing frames such as parapelvic.01, intrathoracic.01, subcutaneous.01.
